title: Velocity acceleration of projectile at max height

content.question: The velocity of a projectile at launch has a horizontal component vh and a vertical component vv. Air resistance is negligible. When the projectile is at the highest point of its trajectory, which of the following show the vertical and horizontal components of its velocity and the vertical component of its acceleration?

choices.label:
Vertical Velocity
 Horizontal Velocity
 Vertical Acceleration

vv
 vh

content.answer:
